user.title: Quatt Heat Pump Configuration
user.description: Configure your Quatt heat pump data range and sensor entities.

data.temp_entities: Temperature sensor entities (comma-separated, in priority order)

gas.title: Gas Analysis (Optional)
gas.description: Configure gas consumption analysis to compare with heat pump performance. Use the period BEFORE your heat pump was installed.

options.title: Additional Options
options.description: Optional: Set your current Quatt stooklijn for comparison. The stooklijn is defined by two points: a low temperature with its power, and a high temperature with its power (e.g. -10°C / 10000W and 16°C / 0W). Leave empty if unknown.

error.invalid_date_range: End date must be after start date
error.gas_entity_required: Gas entity is required when gas analysis is enabled

init.title: Update Configuration
init.description: Fill in the bottom four fields only if you know your current Quatt stooklijn (optional).

run_analysis.name: Run Warmteanalyse
run_analysis.description: Runs the full analysis pipeline: fetches data, calculates heating curves, COP, and heat loss.
